The authors acknowledge the financial support by The University of Tulsa through a Faculty Startup Fund. The
authors would also like to acknowledge Mr. Preston Vargas for his involvement in a group discussion during the
manuscript preparation and Professor Parameswar Harikumar’s help with absorption measurement.
